item.title: Broken glass, litter and debris, 19th October
item.description:
This was all thrown on top of Mickyâ€™s commercial waste. The commercial waste looks to have been picked up leaving all the other shit. THIS CORNER IS ALWAYS DISGUSTING!!!!!!

item.title: Non residents dumping black bags outside bin storage rooms, 19th October

item.title: The pavement on Picardy Road Belvedere DA17 between the junctions of Halt Robin Road and Bunkers Hill is covered with leaves., 19th October
item.description:
The pavement on Picardy Road Belvedere DA17 between the junctions of Halt Robin Road and Bunkers Hill is covered with leaves, possibly causing a slip hazard when it rains. Would arrangements be put in place to clear the leaves as soon as practical.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Picardy Road, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging shrub to close proximity of tree, 19th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 80, Longlands Park Crescent, Longlands, Sidcup, London
